trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Norwalk
There were no other sightings in Norwalk on or around April 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work about 3:50 pm EST in full afternoon sunlight. I saw the oject as I was driving and tried to watch it as well as the road. As I kept looking between the road and the object, it completely disappeared. It was clearly not a plane. Since I was in the car there was no way of hearing any sound. It was close enough to view but not right in my immediate area.
Summary: It was a shining silver metallic almost rounded, stationary object that disappeared instantly
